title: Paneer Tikka
description: Juicy chunks of paneer marinated in a punchy hot and sour tandoori masala are skewered up with onion petals and pieces of pepper.The loaded skewers are then grilled on a wire rack directly over the cooker to infuse deep, smoky flavours into the paneer and veg.

title: Garlic rice
description: One specific thing about this Garlic Rice is that itâ€™s flavoured enough to eat without smothering with sauce, like saucy stir fries and plain white rice..

title: Vada Pav
description: The dish consists of a deep-fried potato dumpling placed inside a bread bun (pav) sliced almost in half through the middle. It is generally accompanied with one or more chutneys and a green chili pepper
